author: DANIEL ZELTER
subject: Monkey Punch News!
body:
I just got this from www.animenewsservice.com :
"9-11-00---- New Anime Movie Project From Monkey Punch - Siamese Cat
Monkey Punch, the well-known manga creator of the Lupin III series, held a 
Sept. 11th press conference in Tokyo where he announced his latest Anime 
Movie project titled Saimese Cat. The film is currently being produced and 
is expected to hit theaters nationwide in Japan in the spring of 2001. Well 
known seiyuu Megumi Hayashibara will voice the lead character June." 
Hopefully someone will fansub it. I also hope he doesn't try to use cgi 
graphics but tries to retain the retro feel of his previous work.
